## At Massdriver, we believe in prevention, not permission.Our platform lets "ops"Ops teams, DevOps teams, platform teamsâ€”whatever your org calls it teams encode their expertise and your organizationâ€™s non-negotiables into preapproved self-service infrastructure powered by the IaC tools you already know.Massdriverâ€”Fast by default. ### How it Works
![](https://massdriver.cloud/assets/645c0dea42f678e1f8b77774/66170749b76c8a177e5a9bc1_package.webp)
1/3
#### Ops Teams Write IaC
DevOps and Platform teams use the infrastructure-as-code tools they know, such as Terraform / OpenTofu, Helm, or CloudFormation, and package them into use-case-specific modules with your policy tooling built in.**Your IaC is no longer just config, its a functional software asset. Policy and cost tools are embedded, cutting down maintenance for Ops teams.**
![](https://massdriver.cloud/assets/645c0dea42f678e1f8b77774/66170749dffdf98ba19852e1_publish.webp)
2/3
#### Ops Teams Publish Modules
Bundled modules are published in the Massdriver Service Catalog, where developers can easily discover supported cloud services and applications with your organization's compliance, security, and guardrails in place.**A central repository for provisioning, policy, and cost controls of your cloud resources.**
![](https://massdriver.cloud/assets/645c0dea42f678e1f8b77774/66170749f3b56aa4e994d6d2_production.webp)
3/3
#### Devs Diagram to Provision
Developers diagram what they want and your IaC modules are used to provision. Developers don't have to copy Helm Charts or Terraform Modules. They don't have brittle IaC pipelines. Instead, Massdriver uses your modules to provision and builds ephemeral CI/CD pipelines behind the scenes based on the tooling _in_ your modules.**Say goodbye to 100's of brittle IaC pipelines.**
